title: Life in the Soudan：Adventures Amongst the Tribes, and Travels in Egypt, in 1881 and 1882
description: 简介： The Soudan, two years ago, was a name unknown to the million, and I will venture to say that at that time not one in fifty knew anything about it. Only those who could afford to obtain Sir Samuel Bakers interesting and instructive work, The Nile Sour...
